item.title: Deploying a Win32 App via Intune
item.description: Pre Reqs # Download the IntuneWin32Util from Here. Download the 7-Zip MSI from Here Create a Folder for your App Copy your 7zip MSI to the folder you just created (This is to keep the copy for record) Create a folder on your computer to store the MSI in while we convert it, this is to avoid packing un needed files into the intune installer eg: Navigate to where you downloaded the Intune App tool and double click on it to run it.
